description: Describes the foundations of all NMOS resources
title: Base resource

label.description: Freeform string label for the resource. Set to null to restore default label.

description.description: Detailed description of the resource. Set to null to restore default label.

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering resources. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty. Set to null to delete or restore default values for a tag.
